title: HDPE / LDPE Bags
shortDescription: Durable polyethylene bags for general and industrial use.
fullDescription: HDPE and LDPE bags are widely used for packaging in both retail and industrial environments. These bags offer high strength, flexibility, and moisture resistance.
applicationOverview: Used in packaging food, electronics, garments, and furniture protection.

title: PVC Shrinkable Rolls
shortDescription: Clear shrink film ideal for tamper-evident packaging.
fullDescription: PVC shrink rolls are used for securing and bundling products. When heat is applied, the film shrinks tightly over the product to ensure protection and visibility.
applicationOverview: Perfect for wrapping boxes, bottles, electronics, and food items.

title: Zip Lock Bags
shortDescription: Reusable sealable bags with strong zip locks.
fullDescription: Zip lock bags provide convenience and secure closure for storing items. They are moisture-proof, reusable, and ideal for short or long-term storage.
applicationOverview: Used in pharmaceuticals, food packaging, hardware, and jewelry storage.

title: PP Bags / Rolls
shortDescription: Polypropylene bags available in rolls or cut sizes.
fullDescription: PP bags are tear-resistant, lightweight, and commonly used for food packaging and retail. The rolls offer easy use in automated or manual packing.
applicationOverview: Used in packaging textiles, grains, sugar, stationery, and more.

title: Garbage Bags
shortDescription: Heavy-duty bags for commercial and residential waste.
fullDescription: Our garbage bags are leak-proof, stretchable, and manufactured from recycled materials. Available in various sizes for all types of bins.
applicationOverview: Used in households, hospitals, offices, and industrial waste collection.

title: PE Shrink Film Sheet Rolls
shortDescription: Polyethylene shrink film sheets for secure packaging.
fullDescription: PE shrink film rolls are designed for heat shrink applications that require high strength and clarity. These films are eco-friendly and recyclable.
applicationOverview: Used for pallet wrapping, bundling bottles, and protecting boxed products.

title: PE Lamination Sheet Rolls
shortDescription: Polyethylene sheets for industrial lamination use.
fullDescription: PE lamination rolls are used to laminate paper, boards, or other packaging substrates. They enhance product durability, water resistance, and gloss.
applicationOverview: Used in food packaging, labels, flexible pouches, and carton coating.

title: HDPE / LDPE Rolls
shortDescription: Polyethylene rolls for industrial sheeting and packaging.
fullDescription: These rolls are ideal for use in packaging machines and as protective coverings. They are easy to handle and can be customized in various thicknesses.
applicationOverview: Used for floor covering, agriculture, furniture wrapping, and pallet liners.

title: POF / PE Stretch Films
shortDescription: Stretchable films for secure wrapping and shipping.
fullDescription: POF and PE stretch films offer elasticity and durability for load stability. Available in hand-wrap or machine-wrap formats.
applicationOverview: Used for packaging pallets, cartons, bundles in logistics, retail, and industrial storage.
